prompt:
Nurse: That's great to hear, Mr. Gardner. Have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?

Patient: Nope.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Gardner. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's great to hear, Mr. Gardner. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to keep track of these symptoms at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be a bit complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?

Patient: No.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion earlier, Mr. Gardner. You had mentioned that you haven't been using more pillows to sleep, correct?

Patient: That's

responses.gpt4: I'm sorry, Mr. Gardner, I didn't catch your full response. Can you confirm whether you have been using more pillows to sleep recently?
responses.our_model: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you. Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you.
